text: Only the very finest warriors are chosen for the honour of serving Cao Ren as offensive troops. These cavalry of exceptional talent with the deadly jian sword are also powerful archers. \\n\\n When they pass muster, they are rewarded with uniquely-crafted jian swords and composite bows to fight on the frontline. Their arrows have pots of flammable oil affixed to them; the fuses are lit, and the arrow loosed to rain down fire upon their enemies.
The brave sharpshooters on their noble steeds would turn the tide against all who trespass Cao Renâ€™s unwavering guard.
